body:
Veeam's Global Campaigns and Digital Marketing team is now hiring. We are utilizing innovative digital and offline marketing techniques for engagement creation, contextual marketing and lifecycle marketing to connect with our audience in 70+ countries.

The Junior Email Marketing Automation specialist is responsible for execution of automated email marketing (nurturing) campaigns in Marketo marketing automation system.

Responsibilities

Segment target audience and choose relevant content for automated emails
Create/coordinate HTML emails, subject lines, layouts
Create and schedule automated email campaigns in Marketo
Analyze email campaign performance, run tests to optimize email content, layouts, campaign logic

Qualifications

Very good command of written English
Analytical capabilities, strong logical skills
Attentive, detail-oriented, responsible and accurate in performing tasks to completion
A self-starter with the ability to learn quickly
Creative, proactive and forward thinker, with a passion for optimization and algorithms
Additional skills

Work experience with Marketing Automation/CRM, HTML, web design is a plus

We offer

Employment in a growing dynamic company
Modern energetic multicultural environment
Interesting people, an excellent team of professionals
Extensive opportunities for professional growth and career
Flexible work schedule
An extended medical insurance policy
Partial compensation of costs on fitness
title: JUNIOR EMAIL MARKETING AUTOMATION SPECIALIST
locations: Afi park 1, București, Municipiul București, România
